column4: you can connect to a seperate screen, I believe. You can use x forwarding and just run the app from the terminal. You may not need the full desktop as many apps have web interfaces and ncurses interfaces which are much more elegant
So it seems. http://ubottu.com/factoids.cgi should be updated.
why? She makes answering repeated stuff really easy
